body_html: Another (hacky) way to fix this: on linux, in your cuda directory there are already symbolic links from the *.7.5 named file to the non-suffixed files. Just create another symbolic link for each of those that is *.7.0 and it works like a charm!
body_text: Another (hacky) way to fix this:  on linux, in your cuda directory there are already symbolic links from the *.7.5 named file to the non-suffixed files.  Just create another symbolic link for each of those that is *.7.0 and it works like a charm!
body: Another (hacky) way to fix this:  on linux, in your cuda directory there are already symbolic links from the *.7.5 named file to the non-suffixed files.  Just create another symbolic link for each of those that is *.7.0 and it works like a charm!
